Fundamental Training

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”DM Serif Display|600|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#000000″ header_3_font_size=”36px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

106-Hour Course

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.4″ text_font=”Open Sans||||||||” text_text_color=”#486066″ text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”Poppins|||on|||||” header_4_font_size=”16px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Here at Violet Zherka’s Training Academy, we offer a top-notch educational experience. Our Fundamental Training Course is set up to help you succeed! This intensive course will give the beginning student a solid fundamental education to get started in the cosmetic tattoo industry.

We are a licensed institute with an approved training program by the American Academy of Micropigmentation (AAM) and Violet Zherka is a Certified Permanent Cosmetics Professional, of the Society of Permanent Cosmetic Professionals (SPCP). Violet is also a Certified Platinum Trainer with the AAM. Our Training course follows all the American Academy of Micropigmentations guidelines which are the highest in the permanent cosmetics industry. The AAM is one of the largest international organizations in the permanent cosmetics industry and one of the only organizations that officially approves permanent cosmetic trainers.

Our 106-hour Fundamental Training Course is an excellent introduction to permanent cosmetics, with 41 hours of home study and 65 hours of class room study.

Our Fundamental Training Course consists of 23 unique components, each one carefully crafted to set you up for success:

  1. Introduction to Permanent Cosmetics
  2. Safe Practices for Permanent Cosmetics Technicians
  3. Introduction to Machines and Devices
  4. Machine Theory
  5. Needles
  6. Color & Pigment Theory
  7. Facial Morphology & Permanent Cosmetic Design
  8. Skin Anatomy
  9. Pain & Anesthesia
  10. Identifying Undertones & Pigment Selection
  11. Consultation
  12. Room & Table Set-Up
  13. Client Preparation
  14. Aftercare
  15. Photography
  16. Office/Workplace Set-Up
  17. Business Set-Up
  18. Hands-On Practice
  19. Demonstration on Live Models by Instructor
  20. Hands-On Student Procedure With Live Models
  21. Benefits of Membership
  22. Class Review
  23. Test & Certificate

Come and learn the necessary skills that will set you apart from other technicians starting out in the business!

COST:

$6,000 (includes permanent cosmetics machine and course materials)
